title: Game Error... i think?
body: I am having a problem that interrupts the switching process between the summoner loading screen and the actual start of the game, after loading in the screen will either: be stuck in the loading screen while i can hear and click on things in the actual game ,or instead of being stuck in the loading screen it is stuck in a full black screen. If it helps it seems to be the first game of the day that this happens to. Thanks

replies.body:
There's been a couple of causes that we've seen for this issue.  The easier of the two solutions is to make sure that your graphics drivers are up to date.  Otherwise, many players have also reported that running through the [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide has helped with this issue. 

Let me know if either of these help!
